title: Travis Scott Falls Through Stage At Drake Show & Drake Refunds The Whole Damn Crowd

organizations.name: travis scott falls through stage at drake show & drake

text:
A photo posted by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Feb 1, 2017 at 5:14pm PST 0 
London, UK â€“ When performing with Drake last night in Londonâ€™s O2 Arena, special guest Travis Scott fell victim to some elaborate set design. While exploring the stage, Scott took a tumble down a hole where a â€œlight-up globeâ€ set decoration is kept. Many captured the fall on video, and it honestly looks like Scott gets pulled into another dimension. travis scott casually falls in a hole 
drake: "that's turnt" pic.twitter.com/3gEErTYriy Close up of Travis falling in the hole at Drake's tour ğŸ˜‚ 
Drake: That's turnt! pic.twitter.com/adMtgsUGu2 
â€” travis scott fanpage (@YamzInTheTrap) February 2, 2017 
Whatâ€™s more remarkable is that Drake doesnâ€™t even seem to realize what has happened at first, and continues to ad-lib, shouting â€œThatâ€™s turnt!â€ into the mic seconds after Travis Scott has vanished. â€œTurntâ€ is one word for it. 
Luckily, it doesnâ€™t seem like Scott was bothered by the incident. He was on Twitter hours later posting about how much he enjoyed London, and agreeing with Drizzyâ€™s assessment of the situation: â€œBy far one of the most turnt and epic shit ever fuck.â€ The shit was fun london is wild 
â€” TRAVIS SCOTT (@trvisXX) February 1, 2017 By far one of the most turnt and epic shit ever fuck 
â€” TRAVIS SCOTT (@trvisXX) February 2, 2017 
The fall caused some technical difficulties and a pause in the show, prompting Drake to announce to a delighted crowd that heâ€™d be refunding the tickets â€“ though it remains to be seen whether people get their money back. International Business Times reports that the Canadian rapper said: 
â€œIâ€™m doing this shit for free tonight, I donâ€™t give a fuck. Because, you know what? Itâ€™s real love in here tonight. I donâ€™t give a fuck about none of these people fucking up. Iâ€™m giving all their shit back. London England, I love you, I hope you enjoyed your free show!â€ The moment after Drake told everyone is getting a refund ğŸ™ŒğŸ½ pic.twitter.com/7FiFYjSsQV
